title: Amtrak Board of Directors - Meeting Agendas and Minutes | Sep 2024

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Amtrak Board of Directors - Meeting Agendas and Minutes | Sep 2024
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The agenda and minutes for any meeting of the Amtrak Board of Directors that occurred in the month of September 2024, including the meetings that were scheduled to be held on September 25th and September 26th.

Noting that in normal course of business these minutes would have been approved at the following Plenary Meeting of the Amtrak Board of Directors on December 4/5, 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Heckscher

title: Amtrak Board of Directors - Meeting Agendas and Minutes | July 2024 2nd request

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Amtrak Board of Directors - Meeting Agendas and Minutes | July 2024 2nd request
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The agenda and minutes for any meeting of the Amtrak Board of Directors that occurred in the month of July 2024, including the meetings that were scheduled to be held on July 24th and July 25th.

Noting that in normal course of business these minutes would have been approved at the Plenary Meeting of the Amtrak Board of Directors on September 25/26, 2024, and if not then at the next meeting on December 4/5, 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Heckscher
